info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 31 at 2:00PM PDT until July 31 at 3:30PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR SOUTHEASTERN NYE AND WESTERN CLARK COUNTIES... At 200 PM PDT, Nye County Sheriff`s office reported Highway 160 at Gamebird is covered in water and the roadway is closed. Flood waters are flowing westward and beginning to enter the city of Pahrump. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Pahrump. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
